verses.verse: A good name <S%H8034><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than precious <S%H2896><s%> ointment; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8081><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> than the day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of one's birth. <S%H3205><s%>

It is better <S%H2896><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of mourning, <S%H60><s%> than to go <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of feasting: <S%H4960><s%> for <S%H834><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> is the end <S%H5490><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> men; <S%H120><s%> and the living <S%H2416><s%> will lay <S%H5414><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> his heart. <S%H3820><s%>

Sorrow <S%H3708><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than laughter: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7814><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> by the sadness <S%H7455><s%> of the countenance <S%H6440><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> is made better. <S%H3190><s%>

The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of mourning; <S%H60><s%> but the heart <S%H3820><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of mirth. <S%H8057><s%>

It is better <S%H2896><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> the rebuke <S%H1606><s%> of the wise, <S%H2450><s%> than for a man <S%H4480><s%> <S%H376><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> the song <S%H7892><s%> of fools. <S%H3684><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> as the crackling <S%H6963><s%> of thorns <S%H5518><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> a pot, <S%H5518><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> is the laughter <S%H7814><s%> of the fool: <S%H3684><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> is vanity. <S%H1892><s%>
Surely <S%H3588><s%> oppression <S%H6233><s%> maketh a wise man <S%H2450><s%> mad; <S%H1984><s%> and a gift <S%H4979><s%> destroyeth <S%H6><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heart. <S%H3820><s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is the end <S%H319><s%> of a thing <S%H1697><s%> than the beginning <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7225><s%> thereof: and the patient <S%H750><s%> in spirit <S%H7307><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than the proud <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1362><s%> in spirit. <S%H7307><s%>

Be not <S%H408><s%> hasty <S%H926><s%> in thy spirit <S%H7307><s%> to be angry: <S%H3707><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> anger <S%H3708><s%> resteth <S%H5117><s%> in the bosom <S%H2436><s%> of fools. <S%H3684><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thou, What <S%H4100><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> the cause that the former days <S%H7945><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7223><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than these? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H428><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou dost not <S%H3808><s%> inquire <S%H7592><s%> wisely <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2451><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> this. <S%H2088><s%>
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> an inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> and by it there is profit <S%H3148><s%> to them that see <S%H7200><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is a defense, <S%H6738><s%> and money <S%H3701><s%> is a defense: <S%H6738><s%> but the excellency <S%H3504><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> is, that wisdom <S%H2451><s%> giveth life <S%H2421><s%> to them that have <S%H1167><s%> it.

Consider <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> make that straight, <S%H8626><s%> <S%H853><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath made crooked? <S%H5791><s%>

In the day <S%H3117><s%> of prosperity <S%H2896><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> joyful, <S%H2896><s%> but in the day <S%H3117><s%> of adversity <S%H7451><s%> consider: <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> hath set <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the one <S%H2088><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the other, <S%H2088><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the end <S%H1700><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> should find <S%H4672><s%> nothing <S%H7945><s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3972><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

<S%H853><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> things have I seen <S%H7200><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of my vanity: <S%H1892><s%> there is <S%H3426><s%> a just <S%H6662><s%> man that perisheth <S%H6><s%> in his righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and there is <S%H3426><s%> a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man that prolongeth <S%H748><s%> his life in his wickedness. <S%H7451><s%>

Be <S%H1961><s%> not <S%H408><s%> righteous <S%H6662><s%> over much; <S%H7235><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> make thyself over wise: <S%H2449><s%> <S%H3148><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> shouldest thou destroy thyself? <S%H8074><s%>

Be not <S%H408><s%> over much <S%H7235><s%> wicked, <S%H7561><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> thou foolish: <S%H5530><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> shouldest thou die <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H3808><s%> thy time? <S%H6256><s%>

It is good <S%H2896><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou shouldest take hold <S%H270><s%> of this; <S%H2088><s%> yea, also <S%H1571><s%> from this <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> withdraw <S%H5117><s%> not <S%H408><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine hand: <S%H3027><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he that feareth <S%H3373><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> of them all. <S%H3605><s%>

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> strengtheneth <S%H5810><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> more than ten <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6235><s%> mighty <S%H7989><s%> men which <S%H834><s%> are <S%H1961><s%> in the city. <S%H5892><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> there is not <S%H369><s%> a just <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H120><s%> upon earth, <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> and sinneth <S%H2398><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> take <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H408><s%> heed <S%H3820><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are spoken; <S%H1696><s%> lest <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> thou hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> curse <S%H7043><s%> thee:

For <S%H3588><s%> oftentimes <S%H7227><s%> <S%H6471><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> thine own heart <S%H3820><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou thyself <S%H859><s%> likewise <S%H1571><s%> hast cursed <S%H7043><s%> others. <S%H312><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2090><s%> have I proved <S%H5254><s%> by wisdom: <S%H2451><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> I will be wise; <S%H2449><s%> but it <S%H1931><s%> was far <S%H7350><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me.
That which is <S%H4100><s%> <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> far off, <S%H7350><s%> and exceeding deep, <S%H6013><s%> <S%H6013><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can find it out? <S%H4672><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> applied <S%H5437><s%> mine heart <S%H3820><s%> to know, <S%H3045><s%> and to search, <S%H8446><s%> and to seek out <S%H1245><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and the reason <S%H2808><s%> of things, and to know <S%H3045><s%> the wickedness <S%H7562><s%> of folly, <S%H3689><s%> even of foolishness <S%H5531><s%> and madness: <S%H1947><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> more bitter <S%H4751><s%> than death <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4194><s%> <S%H853><s%> the woman, <S%H802><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H1931><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> is snares <S%H4685><s%> and nets, <S%H2764><s%> and her hands <S%H3027><s%> as bands: <S%H612><s%> whoso pleaseth <S%H2896><s%> <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall escape <S%H4422><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> her; but the sinner <S%H2398><s%> shall be taken <S%H3920><s%> by her.

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> have I found, <S%H4672><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the preacher, <S%H6953><s%> counting one <S%H259><s%> by one, <S%H259><s%> to find out <S%H4672><s%> the account: <S%H2808><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> seeketh, <S%H1245><s%> but I find <S%H4672><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H120><s%> among a thousand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H505><s%> have I found; <S%H4672><s%> but a woman <S%H802><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> those <S%H428><s%> have I not <S%H3808><s%> found. <S%H4672><s%>

Lo, <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> only <S%H905><s%> have I found, <S%H4672><s%> that <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> man <S%H120><s%> upright; <S%H3477><s%> but they <S%H1992><s%> have sought out <S%H1245><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> inventions. <S%H2810><s%>
